PCClass.Name: Barbarian
PCClass.Feature: 12 + CON; 1d12 (7) + CON after 1st
Light, Medium, Shields
Simple, martial
None
Strength, Constitution

Advantage on STR checks/saving throws. Bonus Damage (see table) on STR weapon attacks. Resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, slashing. Can't cast spells while raging. Duration: 1 minute or end of first round that you haven't taken damage or attacked a hostile creature.
Armor Class when unarmored is 10 + DEX + CON (stacks with shields).
Gives/grants advantage on attack rolls (toggle on first attack of turn).
Advantage on Dex saves against effects you can see. Inactive if blinded, deafened, or incapacitated.
You can attack 2x per Attack action.
Gain 10 ft/round speed while not wearing Heavy Armor.
Advantage on initiative. You can act on surprise rounds if you rage first thing.
Extra weapon damage on crit increases by 1 weapon dice. Increases to +2 at 13th and +3 at 17th.
If you drop to 0 HP while raging you can make a DC 10 CON save and drop to 1 HP instead. Each time you use it the DC increases by 5. DC resets after long rest.
Rage only ends early if you fall unconscious or choose to end it.
Use the larger of your STR score or STR check result.
STR and CON scores increase by 4 each, up to 24 max.
See PHB for details.

If you roll initiative with no Bardic Inspiration uses left, you regain one use.

PCClass.Name: Fighter
PCClass.Feature: 10 + CON; 1d12 (6) + CON after 1st
All
Simple, martial
None
Strength, Constitution

You gain one of the following benefits: Archery: You gain a +2 bonus to attacks made with ranged weapons. Defense: Gain +1 AC while wearing armor. Dueling: Gain +2 to attacks with 1H melee weapons while no weapon is in the other hand. Great Weapon Fighting: When you roll a 1 or 2 on the damage die with a weapon you are wielding in two hands, you may reroll that die and use the new result. Protection: When a creature you can see attacks a target other than you within 5 feet of you, you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll. You must be wielding a shield. Two-Weapon Fighting: When you engage in two-weapon fighting, you can add your ability modifier to the damage of the second attack.
On your turn you can use a bonus action to regain 1d10 + fighter level HP. Recharges on short or long rest.
On your turn you can take an additional action.
Choose a martial archetype. Note: if you choose Eldritch Knight, please level as Eldritch knight from level 1.
You can attack 2x per attack action. This increases to 3x at 11th level and 4x at 20th level.
You can increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1 at 4th, 6th, 8th, 12th, 14th, 16th, and 19th level.
Reroll a failed saving throw. Use the new roll.

PCClass.Name: Monk
PCClass.Feature: d8
8 + CON; 1d8 (5) + CON after 1st.
None
Simple, shortswords
One type of artisan's tools or one musical instrument
Strength, Dexterity
While not wearing armor and not wielding a shield, AC is 10 + DEX + WIS

While unarmed or wielding monk weapons (shortswords or any simple non-two-handed/heavy weapon) and unarmored (no shield): Use DEX instead of STR for attack and damage. Use d4 instead of regular unarmed strike damage. Damage increases with level. Bonus action unarmed strike when you use the Attack action.
You gain Ki points equal to your level. You regain these points on short/long rests. Ki save DC = 8 + proficiency + WIS.
Spend 1 ki point immediately after using Attack action to make 2 unarmed strikes as bonus action.
Spend 1 ki point to take dodge action as bonus action on your turn.
Spend 1 ki point to take disengage or dash as bonus action; jump distance doubled for the turn.
Your speed increases by 10 ft/round while not armored. This increases by 5 ft/round every 4 levels. At 9th level you gain the ability to run across vertical surfaces and liquids.
See PHB.

Use reaction to catch or deflect a missile when hit with ranged weapon attack. Damage reduced by 1d10 + DEX + level. If the damage is reduced to 0, you can catch it and throw it back. See PHB 78 for details.
Use your reaction to reduce falling damage by 5 x monk level.
You can attack 2x when you use the Attack action. Does not stack.
When you hit with a melee weapon attack you can spend 1 ki point. Target must succeed on a CON save or be stunned until the end of your next turn.
Unarmed strikes count as magical for overcoming resistances and immunities.
When you can make a DEX save and take half damage, you instead take no damage on success and half damage on failure.
You can use your action to end one effect on yourself that causes charm or fear.
You are immune to disease and poison.

Feature.Name: Tongue of the Sun and Moon

PCClass.Feature: You understand (and can be understood) in all spoken languages.
You have proficiency in all saving throws. You can use a ki point to reroll any failed saves.
You do not suffer the effects of old age and cannot be magically aged. Your lifespan does not increase however. You need no food or water.

You can use your action to spend 4 ki points to become invisible for 1 minute. During that time you have resistance to all damage except force damage. You can cast Astral Projection using 8 ki points.
When you roll initiative and have no ki points left, you regain 4 ki points.

PCClass.Name: Paladin
PCClass.Feature: 10 + CON; 1d10 (6) + CON after 1st.
All armor, shields
Simple and martial weapons.
None
Wisdom, Charisma

As an action you can sense the presence of any undead, celestial or fiend within 60 ft. You know the type but not the identity. You also detect the presence of any hallowed or desecrated areas within range. You can use this up to 1 + CHA times per long rest.

You have a pool healing up to 5 x paladin level. With this pool you can: Touch and heal any creature as an action. Spend 5 points to cure any disease or neutralize poison on a target. This has no effect on undead or constructs.

You gain one of the following: Defese: While wearing armor you gain +1 to AC. Dueling: While you are wielding a melee weapon in 1 hand and no other weapon you gain +2 to damage with that weapon. Great Weapon Fighting: Can reroll 1s or 2s on damage dice for two-handed weapons. Protection: When a visible creature attacks a target within 5 feet of you you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage. Must be wielding a shield.
When you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack you can expend a spell slot to add 2d8 + (n-1)d8 radiant damage; n = level of slot. Max is 5d8. Damage increases by 1d8 on undead and fiends.
You are immune to disease.
See PHB 85.
You can attack 2x when you use the Attack action. Does not stack.
You and allies within 10' gain +CHA bonus to saving throws while you are conscious. Range increases to 30' at 18th level.
You and allies within 10' cannot be frightened while you are conscious. Range increases to 30' at 18th level.
You deal 1d8 extra radiant damage on hit. Stacks with Divine Smite.
You can use your action to end one spell on yourself or one willing creature (touch). Uses: CHA/long rest.
